concept.title: Change the Lineweight of an Object
concept.shortdesc: There are three choices for changing the lineweight of an object:

ul.li: If the lineweight of an object is set to BYLAYER, and you reassign the object to a different layer, the object acquires its lineweight fromthe new layer.
If the lineweight of an object is set to BYLAYER, you can change the lineweight of the layer the object is on, and all objects assigned to BYLAYER on that layer are updated automatically.

Specify a lineweight for an object to override the layer's lineweight. If you want to specify a lineweight to override the player-determined lineweight of an object, change an existing object's lineweight from BYLAYER to a specific lineweight.

conbody.p: In order to create subsequent objects using a new lineweight, you have to change the lineweight setting on the Properties toolbar from BYLAER to the specific one.
